title: ARchitect
description: Directed a 20-member team to launch an AR social app on iOS and visionOS with Firebase-backed backend.

title: Clother
description: Led the end-to-end build of Clother, an iOS app that streamlines wardrobe uploads and outfit generation, earning Best Bootcamp Project honors.

title: Fantasy Football ML Predictor
description: Constructed a Python ETL and modeling pipeline that predicts fantasy football performance with 97% accuracy and supports a draft optimizer.
